news.title: Intel earnings, Paramount-Skydance deal, Tesla rises
news.summary: Here are some of the stories Wall Street is watching on Friday, July 25. Shares of Intel (INTC) are falling after posting a Q2 loss, though revenue topped estimates. The FCC has approved the $8 billion merger between Paramount (PARA, PARAA) and Skydance. Tesla (TSLA) shares are rising on a Business Insider report that the company plans to launch its robotaxi service in San Francisco this weekend. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

news.title: Broadcom's record, Charter's Q2 miss, Newmont's buyback plan
news.summary: Market Domination host Josh Lipton tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Broadcom (AVGO) stock extends gains after hitting a record high, with the chipmaker outperforming nearly all of the "Magnificent Seven" stocks this year, second only to Nvidia (NVDA). Charter Communications (CHTR) stock sinks after a second quarter earnings miss and a larger-than-expected loss of residential internet customers. Newmont (NEM) beats second quarter expectations and posts record-high free cash flow, while also announcing a $3 billion share buyback program. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
